channel.title: Nova pk server
channel.description:
[u][b]Future Updates[/b][/u]
[ul][li]New Client Background (Definitely)[/li] [li]Administrator CP (On Client)[/li][/ul]
[ul][li]Custom Gamelogin Sprites[/li] [li]Moderator CP (On Client)[/li][/ul]
[ul][li]JaGeX Item Compatibility[/li] [li]Custom Sprites (Chatbox, Inventory Backing, Trade Backing) [/li][/ul]
[ul][li]Moderator Crowns[/li] [li]Administrator Crowns[/li][/ul]
I just had to add that
[IMG]http://i377.photobucket.com/albums/oo211/xthenoosex/untitled.jpg[/img]
This is my first client release it's a little messy so, i'm sprucing it up as i go along. I have made a client where it's possible to change your Server ip:(Not that revelutionary) (So it can fit your server if it's like figment (like mine), I always find it a bit funny to be a owner and not be-able to release something that you've put alot of hardwork in, i never released this client.I personally love clients, it makes the game more enjoyable and allows you to access features you couldn't access before.It probably enables you to feel like your having a better game experience, almost like your playing runescape. This client is going to be made to fit custom server such as richscape, deltascape, and other custom sources like butter scape. It will allow you to log onto butterscape and see all the items you want to see or go on figment and see them anyways i will also be making this a very big project with a V3 but i can start to far ahead. I really hope you enjoy.
[IMG]http://i377.photobucket.com/albums/oo211/xthenoosex/ClientPicture1.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i377.photobucket.com/albums/oo211/xthenoosex/ClientPicture2.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i377.photobucket.com/albums/oo211/xthenoosex/ClientPicture2-1.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i377.photobucket.com/albums/oo211/xthenoosex/Clientpic.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i377.photobucket.com/albums/oo211/xthenoosex/Clientpic-1.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i377.photobucket.com/albums/oo211/xthenoosex/Clientpic-2.jpg[/img]
And last but not least the about tab on the client.
[IMG]http://i377.photobucket.com/albums/oo211/xthenoosex/Clientpic-3.jpg[/img]
With the money value pictures some people make it a little wacky like 1k is pink 10k is green 100m is like white i have aknowledged that this is the right color value.
Credits:
Galkon's Pride 15% for using his item's most. 25% Jukk for his models 10% Gnarly.. for alot of his help (items aswell) 50% to me for the rest
Working on the screen shots. The others were messy.
Download's : [url=http://rapidshare.com/files/158398845/Nova_pk_server.rar.html] Download here [/url]
